articles.author: Amelia Wynne
articles.title: Coleen Rooney 'signs Disney+ deal for rights to Wagatha Christie documentary' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Sun claims that the WAG, 36, will now be set to earn more than her former England footballer husband Wayne, also 36, after reportedly inking the deal following a bidding war.
articles.content:
Coleen Rooney has signed a multimillion-pound deal with Disney+ for the rights to a tell-all Wagatha Christie documentary, it has been reported.
It has been claimed the WAG, 36, is set to earn more … [+10466 chars]

articles.title: A ‘love rat’, a shelf-stacker and a Fleabag spoof: Edinburgh comedy awards shortlist announced - The Guardian
articles.description: From Liz Kingsman’s ‘messy woman’ send-up to Seann Walsh’s memories of his off-screen Strictly kiss, the 10-strong shortlist for the first Dave’s Edinburgh comedy awards is a triumph for diversity though not without glaring omissions
articles.content: The nominations have been announced for the first Daves Edinburgh Comedy awards in three years and they include a notorious tabloid love rat, an act who quit comedy mid-pandemic to stack supermarket … [+3842 chars]
